A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Awful\, truly awful. This film makes literally no sense at all.
It is not a sequel it's is a reboot to be watched in complete isolation to the first 6 films
This is truly cynical corporate rebooting and shameful. Rian Johnson has killed Star Wars and created a new one. Critics are applauding and fans are disgusted. 

There are so manyplot holes I can't list them\, actually I can\, All of it. Literally nothing in the entire film aligns to the previous 7 at all. Seriously at all
